title: Electro?!mancer

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Attack a player each night. They have 24 hours to choose another player to attack, even if they die. If they don't, it attacks someone random. The player attacked this way then attacks a player in the same way, then the chain stops.

desc:
Post 2723
*Sunscreen has zapped Mac with Lightning?! who now has 24 hours to zap another player*
